whole_object: "When the grand piano's sibling went missing, it note-ably caused treble in the auditorium!" (Wordplay and pun on musical terms)
single_object:
- Piano: The piano has been feeling quite grand lately, maybe because it's always the key player at concerts.
- Auditorium: This auditorium is so good at playing 'hard to seat', it always stands room-only at every event!
multi_object:
- Piano  
- Auditorium  
- "Why did the piano break up with the auditorium? It couldn't handle the pressure of all those empty seats!"  

- Auditorium  
- Piano  
- "The auditorium told the piano, 'You really know how to strike a chord, but I’m just here for the applause!'"
